name: Client
text: Susie was essential in finding our new home. She worked SO HARD and was so in-tune with what we wanted that she ended up finding us the perfect house. I can't thank her (and her team) enough for finding us our forever home.

name: Client
text: Susie was great to work with. She was knowledgeable about the market and we appreciated her communication throughout the selling and buying process. Susie had our best interest at heart. Susie and her team are Golden.

name: Client
text: I've been in the market on and off to find a house for almost 2 years. Susie made sure she checked in frequently. Finally we found this property and it was a breeze working with her to close. Will definitely recommend her.
